EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Account Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Requesting Account Set Up - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please fill in the new Account details in this email and send it to AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com. Please update the appropriate record in SFDC once you receive notification from AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com of the new Account.
This is a request to create a new account in SFDC:
Account Name: Account Market: Account Type: Account Business Segment/CBT: CBT Team: Street Address: City: State: Zip: Country: Phone Number: Fleet: Contact Name: Contact Street Address: Contact City: Contact State: Contact Zip: Contact Country: Contact Phone Number: Contact Email:
Note to AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com: Please respond to sender once the account has been created.
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time. Honeywell - Confidential
